title: Print, "Design for Ornament: Apollo", ca. 1580
inscribed: In black ink, lower margin: CVM PRF. REGIS. STEPHANVS. F.; reverse: 22 Maz Endt 1839
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Oval ornament design featuring a central male figure in classical drapery with arms outstretched surrounded by foliate decorative elements and two cherubs playing the lyre.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "Design for Ornament: Apollo", ca. 1580.
ca. 1580. Engraving on off-white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1942-36-27-1.
